item.description:
Marcel Carné directed this film, of which François Truffaut said “I have made twenty-three films. Well, I would swap them all for the chance to have made Children of Paradise.” It has been called "the finest French film ever made" and this is a newly restored print.

You can read more about it here: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0037674/

The Cinestudio website has quite a few reviews:
http://www.cinestudio.org/current-schedule

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: "Children of Paradise" @ Cinestudio
